mapper.select: select * from MUNGCATUSER where id=#{id} and pwd=#{pwd};
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MUNGCATUSER (id, pwd, nickname, name, gender, email, tel, zipcode, addr1, addr2, logtime) VALUES (#{id}, #{pwd}, #{nickname}, #{name}, #{gender}, #{email}, #{tel}, #{zipcode}, #{addr1}, #{addr2}, NOW())
mapper.update: UPDATE MUNGCATUSER SET TOTALWRITE = (TOTALWRITE + 1) WHERE id = #{id}

update MUNGCATUSER set pwd=#{pwd}, nickname=#{nickname}, name=#{name}, gender=#{gender}, email=#{email}, tel=#{tel}, zipcode=#{zipcode}, addr1=#{addr1}, addr2=#{addr2}, profile=#{profile} WHERE id=#{id}
